name: RPG Games on the PS2 Quiz | Role-Playing Games Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Upon the release of ".hack quarantine" how many ".hack" games were there?
questions.explanation:
6.

	They were: ".hack", ".hack Akushou Heni Vol. 2", ".hack Infection Part 2", ".hack Part 1: Infection", ".hack Part 2: .hack Part 3: Outbreak", ".hack Part 4: Quarantine".

Activision.

	This game was classified as an action RPG. Activision had released all the "X-Men" games across all the patforms.

questions.text: Rockstar and Rockstar North are the same company.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Rockstar renamed itself Rockstar North after the release of "Grand Theft Auto 3", but before the release of "GTA: Vice City".

questions.text: "The Bard's Tale" is an RPG game.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It was released in 2004 by Activision.

questions.text: Is "Realms of Everquest: Champions of Norath" in an "Everquest" expansion?
questions.explanation:
No.

	This action RPG game takes on the name of "Everquest" but is not an expansion pack as expansions can only be had for computer games.

questions.text: "Xenosaga" is a sequel to what PS1 classic?
questions.explanation:
Xenogears.

	Though this game uses similar characters, and had the same creator it is in fact not technically a sequel. It was unofficialy called a prequel however the publisher of "Xenogears" did not authorize the creation of "Xenosaga".

LucasArts & Lucas Arts.

	LucasArts has released every "Star Wars" game that has been made for any platform.

questions.text: Konami released both  "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duelists of the Roses" and "Yu-Gi-Oh! Shin Duel Monsters 2".
questions.explanation:
True.

	These were the first two "Yu-Gi-Oh" games that were released for the PS2.

questions.text: "Grand Theft Auto 3" is considered an RPG game.
questions.explanation:
False.

	"Grand Theft Auto 3" was a very controversial game upon its release. Many chain stores like Walmart refused to stock it. This game is considered an action adventure game.

questions.text: "The Great Escape" is classified as what type of game?
questions.explanation:
Action Adventure.

	Released by Pivotal games this is considered an action adventure game.
